00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
00023 
00024 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/algorithm/string.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/ptr_container/ptr_vector.hpp>
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00032 inline std::string lib_prefix() { return "[CLPP] "; }
00033 
00036 enum value_semantic {
00037     no_semantic         
00038     , path              
00039     , ipv4              
00040     , ipv6              
00041     , ip                
00042     , email             
00043 };
00044 
00047 namespace detail {
00048 
00049 template< typename T >
00050 inline std::string to_str( const T& t ) {
00051     std::string as_string; 
00052     try {
00053         as_string = boost::lexical_cast< std::string >( t );
00054     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00055         std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Value cannot be present as std::string!";
00056         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00057     }
00058     return as_string;
00059 }
00060 
00061 template
00062 <
00063     typename STLContainer
00064     , typename Element
00065 >
00066 inline void delete_element( STLContainer& cont, const Element& element ) {
00067     cont.erase( std::remove( cont.begin(), cont.end(), element )
00068                 , cont.end() );
00069 }
00070 
00071 } // namespace detail
00072 } // namespace clpp
00073 
00074 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
